data.name: Mercenary Lieutenant
data.description: A field combat leader who makes allies faster and stronger.

starItems.name: Mercenary Lieutenant
starItems.description: A field combat leader who makes allies faster and stronger.

1.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage. <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to grant <color=#86e619>1</color> ability energy to a random ally. <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to grant <color=#86e619>1</color> ability energy to <color=#86e619>1</color> random <color=#fff568>MERCENARY VILLAIN</color>  ally.

2.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage. <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to grant <color=#86e619>1</color> ability energy to a random ally. <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to grant <color=#86e619>1</color> ability energy to <color=#86e619>1</color> random <color=#fff568>MERCENARY VILLAIN</color>  ally.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target
Grant <color=#86e619>1</color> ability energy to <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>MERCENARY VILLAIN</color> allies

3.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage. <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to grant <color=#86e619>1</color> ability energy to a random ally. <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to grant <color=#86e619>1</color> ability energy to <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>MERCENARY VILLAIN</color>  allies.
3.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to grant ability energy to random ally and <color=#fff568>MERCENARY VILLAIN</color> allies

4.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage. <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to grant <color=#86e619>1</color> ability energy to a random ally. <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to grant <color=#86e619>1</color> ability energy to <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>MERCENARY VILLAIN</color>  allies.

5.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage. <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to grant <color=#86e619>1</color> ability energy to a random ally. <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to grant <color=#86e619>1</color> ability energy to <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>MERCENARY VILLAIN</color>  allies.
5.nextUpgrade:
Always grant <color=#86e619>1</color> ability energy to a random ally
Always grant <color=#86e619>1</color> ability energy to <color=#86e619>3</color> random <color=#fff568>MERCENARY VILLAIN</color> allies

6.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage. Grant <color=#86e619>1</color> ability energy to a random ally. Grant <color=#86e619>1</color> ability energy to <color=#86e619>3</color> random <color=#fff568>MERCENARY VILLAIN</color>  allies.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target
Grant <color=#86e619>1</color> ability energy to all <color=#fff568>MERCENARY VILLAIN</color> allies.

7.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>290%</color> damage. Grant <color=#86e619>1</color> ability energy to a random ally. Grant <color=#86e619>1</color> ability energy to all <color=#fff568>MERCENARY VILLAIN</color>  allies.

1.description: Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to <color=#86e619>3</color> random allies or self.
1.nextUpgrade: Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to <color=#86e619>1</color> random ally or self

2.description: Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to <color=#86e619>3</color> random allies or self. Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to <color=#86e619>1</color> random ally or self.
2.nextUpgrade: Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to <color=#86e619>2</color> random allies or self

3.description: Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to <color=#86e619>3</color> random allies or self. Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to <color=#86e619>2</color> random allies or self.
3.nextUpgrade: Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to <color=#86e619>4</color> random allies or self

4.description: Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to <color=#86e619>4</color> random allies or self. Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to <color=#86e619>2</color> random allies or self.
4.nextUpgrade: Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to <color=#86e619>4</color> random allies or self

5.description: Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to <color=#86e619>4</color> random allies or self. Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to <color=#86e619>4</color> random allies or self.

6.description: Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to <color=#86e619>4</color> random allies or self. Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to <color=#86e619>4</color> random allies or self.
6.nextUpgrade:
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to all allies
Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to all allies

7.description: Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to all allies and self. Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to all allies and self.

1.description:
On Turn, <color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to heal most injured ally for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health. If ally is <color=#fff568>MERCENARY</color>, heal again for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.
When a non-summoned <color=#fff568>MERCENARY</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, fill this character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, when an enemy attacks this character or an adjacent ally, heal most injured <color=#fff568>MERCENARY</color> ally for <color=#86e619>500</color> Health.
1.nextUpgrade:
Chance to Heal most injured ally by +<color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, when an enemy attacks this character or an adjacent ally, heal most injured <color=#fff568>MERCENARY</color> ally for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health

2.description:
On Turn, <color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to heal most injured ally for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health. If ally is <color=#fff568>MERCENARY</color>, heal again for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.
When a non-summoned <color=#fff568>MERCENARY</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, fill this character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, when an enemy attacks this character or an adjacent ally, heal most injured <color=#fff568>MERCENARY</color> ally for <color=#86e619>500</color> Health + <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> chance to heal most injured ally on Turn
Fill Speed Bar by +<color=#86e619>15%</color>
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, Heal +<color=#86e619>500</color> Health to most injured <color=#fff568>MERCENARY</color> ally

3.description:
On Turn, <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to heal most injured ally for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health. If ally is <color=#fff568>MERCENARY</color>, heal again for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.
When a non-summoned <color=#fff568>MERCENARY</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, fill this character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>25%</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, when an enemy attacks this character or an adjacent ally, heal most injured <color=#fff568>MERCENARY</color> ally for <color=#86e619>1,000</color> Health + <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.
3.nextUpgrade: On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, Heal +<color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health to most injured <color=#fff568>MERCENARY</color> ally

4.description:
On Turn, <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to heal most injured ally for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health. If ally is <color=#fff568>MERCENARY</color>, heal again for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.
When a non-summoned <color=#fff568>MERCENARY</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, fill this character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>25%</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, when an enemy attacks this character or an adjacent ally, heal most injured <color=#fff568>MERCENARY</color> ally for <color=#86e619>1,000</color> Health + <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.
4.nextUpgrade:
On Turn, +<color=#86e619>10%</color> chance to heal most injured ally for +<color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health
Fill Speed Bar by +<color=#86e619>15%</color>
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, Heal +<color=#86e619>500</color> Health to most injured <color=#fff568>MERCENARY</color> ally

5.description:
On Turn, <color=#86e619>40%</color> chance to heal most injured ally for <color=#86e619>25%</color> of this character's Max Health. If ally is <color=#fff568>MERCENARY</color>, heal again for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.
When a non-summoned <color=#fff568>MERCENARY</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, fill this character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>40%</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, when an enemy attacks this character or an adjacent ally, heal most injured <color=#fff568>MERCENARY</color> ally for <color=#86e619>1,500</color> Health + <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.
